name: Sarah Jenkins
quote: The wood-fired ribeye was a revelation. RisÅ« & Oak has completely elevated the dining scene in SoMa. The atmosphere is both intimate and electric.

name: Michael Chen
quote: Chef Sato's fusion of Japanese precision with Californian abundance is masterful. The charred octopus is a must-order.

name: Elena Rodriguez
quote: Impeccable service and a wine list that perfectly complements the smoky, rich flavors of the menu. A perfect anniversary spot.

name: David Park
quote: Beautiful interior and great cocktails. The reservations are hard to get, but absolutely worth the wait.
